summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3905 for the improvement of Mayfair Avenue, from Ray Street to Newell Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47608, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
